title: Mexican chicken vegetable soup
ingredients: ['3 boneless, skinless chicken breast fillets - cooked and shredded', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans', '1 (198g) tin sweetcorn', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '1 to 3 green chillies, seeded and chopped (or to taste)', '2 (500g) tubs chicken stock', '1 tablespoon ground cumin']
